Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps

Class BaseSteps

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps.BaseSteps
public class BaseSteps extends Object
Methods used to define basic operations. Functionality in this class includes clicking given elements, entering text, selecting items, verifying elements exist, contains given text, or are active, enabled, or hidden, verifying table columns or table rows have given text, unique text, text for stored values, navigating results, and basic browser interaction.

  • Method Details

    • before

      public static void before(io.cucumber.java.Scenario scenario)

    • click

      @When("^I click (?:the|a|an|on) (.*?)$") public static void click(String elementName)
      Clicks the element that matches the given elementName as defined on the current Page object. The page object and driver object are defined by the WebDriverFactory and PageFactory objects. The derived Page Object (extends Page) should define a method named [element name]_[element type] returning a Element object (e.g. login_button).

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I click a login button
      • I click the Login button
      • I click an Operation Button
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element to click

    • hover

      @When("^I hover (?:on |over )?(?:the|a|an)[ ](.*?)$") public static void hover(String elementName)
      Hovers the middle of the given element

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I hover a login button
      • I hover over the Login button
      • I hover an Operation Button
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element to hover

    • dragAndDropToObject

      @When("I drag (?:the |an? )?(.*?) (?:on|in)?to (?:the |an? )?(.*?)$") public static void dragAndDropToObject(String source, String target) throws IOException
      Drags the first element onto the second element.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I drag Box A onto Box B
      • I drag the first name to the answer box
      • I drag an animal icon into a habitat icon
      Parameters:
      source - String the name of the source element to drag
      target - String the name of the target element the source is being dragged to
      Throws:
      IOException - if the javascript drag and drop file cannot be loaded

    • wait

      @When("^I wait (\\d{1,2}(?:[.,]\\d{1,4})?) seconds?(?:.*)$") public static void wait(double seconds)
      Waits for the sum of the given number of seconds and fractions of sections. This step is used to add in an implicit wait time using a Cucumber step. Ideally this should be used to determine if you just need to wait for something to load. Once that is determined, you should be fixing the following method to improve its own wait functionality. In the cases where you have to impose a wait, you should use the smallest amount of time possible. This method can wait as small amount a time as 1 millisecond using decimals. This method deals with whole numbers as well as fractions of a second using decimals. Furthermore, you can put a reason at the end of the step for clarity and the method will ignore that extra text when matching.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I wait 1 second
      • I wait 3 seconds
      • I wait 0.2 seconds
      • I wait 0.5 seconds before continuing
      • I wait 0.001 second to ensure the element is visible before checking it
      Parameters:
      seconds - double the number of seconds to wait

    • navigateToPage

      @Given("^I (?:navigate to|start|open|am on) the (.*?)$") public static void navigateToPage(String pageName)
      Loads a page or starts an executable based on the environment you are currently testing. The url/executable is set in the page object yaml file. Refer to the documentation in the sentinel.example project for more information.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I navigate to the Login Page
      • I start the Notepad Application
      • I open the Calculator Executable
      • I am on the Login Page

      SEE ALSO: VerificationSteps.redirectedToPage() for how to switch page objects without starting a new driver.

      Parameters:
      pageName - String Page Object Name

    • navigateToPageWithArguments

      @Given("^I pass the arguments? \"([^\"]*)\" to the (.*?)$") public static void navigateToPageWithArguments(String arguments, String pageName)
      Loads a page based on the environment you are currently testing. The url is set in the page object yaml file. Refer to the documentation in the sentinel.example project for more information. You cannot load a URL directly, because once there you would not be able to do anything.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I pass the argument "?docYear=2003" to the Documents Page
      • I pass the arguments "?firstname=bob&lastname=smith" to the Users Page
      • I pass the arguments "/apples/oranges" to the Fruits Page
      Parameters:
      arguments - String the literal string to append to the default URL.
      pageName - String Page Object Name

    • pressBrowserButton

      @When("^I press the browser (back|forward|refresh) button$") public static void pressBrowserButton(String option)
      Navigates through basic browser actions: forward, back and refresh

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I press the browser forward button
      • I press the browser refresh button
      • I press the browser back button
      Parameters:
      option - String the browser action

    • acceptOrCloseJsAlert

      @When("^I (accept|close) the JS alert$") public static void acceptOrCloseJsAlert(String action)
      Interacts with the open JS alert. Accept or close.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I accept the JS alert
      • I close the JS alert
      Parameters:
      action - String the action to take on the JS alert
